name: admin.users.assign
desc: Add an Enterprise user to a workspace.

channel_ids.desc: Comma separated values of channel IDs to add user in the new workspace.

is_restricted.desc: True if user should be added to the workspace as a guest.

is_ultra_restricted.desc: True if user should be added to the workspace as a single-channel guest.

user_id.desc: The ID of the user to add to the workspace.

errors.feature_not_enabled: The Admin APIs feature is not enabled for this team
errors.invalid_role_for_user: The requested status is incompatible with the user's role on another workspace.
errors.invited_user_not_created: The invited user could not be created.
errors.invited_user_not_reactivated: The invited user could not be reactivated.
errors.invitor_cannot_see_channel: The invitor is not part of one or many channels that the user was requested to be added to
errors.not_an_admin: This method wasn't called by an admin.
errors.user_already_team_member: The given user is already active on the given team.
errors.user_is_bot: The given user is a bot from an app. This api only works with humans.
